description:
After installing nova diablo3 from bzr euca-describe-image doen't work.

Versions:
euca2ools: 1.3.1 (main-31337 2009-04-04)

Steps to reproduce:
1- checkout nova revison 1433
2- create a user, a project (named as the user) and a the novarc file
3- source the novarc
4- launch euca-describe-instances

example:
1- check bzr revision
$ bzr update
Tree is up to date at revision 1433
$ bin/nova-manage version
2011.3-dev (2011.3-LOCALBRANCH:LOCALREVISION)

2- create user, project and novarc file
$ bin/nova-manage user admin matteo
2011-08-14 13:15:41,073 DEBUG nova.utils [-] backend <module 'nova.db.sqlalchemy.api' from '/home/matteo/openstack/nova/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.pyc'> from (pid=29273) __get_backend /home/matteo/openstack/nova/nova/utils.py:445
2011-08-14 13:15:41,164 INFO nova.db.sqlalchemy [-] Using mysql/eventlet db_pool.
2011-08-14 13:15:41,314 AUDIT nova.auth.manager [-] Created user matteo (admin: True)
export EC2_ACCESS_KEY=b05aa1c9-513b-473c-a6e0-0264641203cb
export EC2_SECRET_KEY=99bba365-ab39-4df4-9568-32f605d4f009

$ bin/nova-manage project create matteo matteo
2011-08-14 13:16:38,666 DEBUG nova.utils [-] backend <module 'nova.db.sqlalchemy.api' from '/home/matteo/openstack/nova/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.pyc'> from (pid=29304) __get_backend /home/matteo/openstack/nova/nova/utils.py:445
2011-08-14 13:16:38,668 INFO nova.db.sqlalchemy [-] Using mysql/eventlet db_pool.

$ bin/nova-manage project environment matteo matteo

2011-08-14 13:18:02,214 INFO nova.db.sqlalchemy [-] Using mysql/eventlet db_pool.

4- source novarc
5- launch euca-describe-images
$ euca2ools-1.3.1/bin/euca-describe-images 
2011-08-14 13:23:58,846 DEBUG nova.auth.manager [-] Looking up user: u'b05aa1c9-513b-473c-a6e0-0264641203cb' from (pid=28195) authenticate /home/matteo/openstack/nova/nova/auth/manager.py:277

title: euca-describe-images : KeyError: u'

comments.content:
After installing nova diablo3 from bzr euca-describe-image doen't work.

Versions:
euca2ools: 1.3.1 (main-31337 2009-04-04)

Steps to reproduce:
1- checkout nova revison 1433
2- create a user, a project (named as the user) and a the novarc file
3- source the novarc
4- launch euca-describe-instances

example:
1- check bzr revision
$ bzr update
Tree is up to date at revision 1433
$ bin/nova-manage version
2011.3-dev (2011.3-LOCALBRANCH:LOCALREVISION)

2- create user, project and novarc file
$ bin/nova-manage user admin matteo
2011-08-14 13:15:41,073 DEBUG nova.utils [-] backend <module 'nova.db.sqlalchemy.api' from '/home/matteo/openstack/nova/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.pyc'> from (pid=29273) __get_backend /home/matteo/openstack/nova/nova/utils.py:445
2011-08-14 13:15:41,164 INFO nova.db.sqlalchemy [-] Using mysql/eventlet db_pool.
2011-08-14 13:15:41,314 AUDIT nova.auth.manager [-] Created user matteo (admin: True)
export EC2_ACCESS_KEY=b05aa1c9-513b-473c-a6e0-0264641203cb
export EC2_SECRET_KEY=99bba365-ab39-4df4-9568-32f605d4f009

$ bin/nova-manage project create matteo matteo
2011-08-14 13:16:38,666 DEBUG nova.utils [-] backend <module 'nova.db.sqlalchemy.api' from '/home/matteo/openstack/nova/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.pyc'> from (pid=29304) __get_backend /home/matteo/openstack/nova/nova/utils.py:445
2011-08-14 13:16:38,668 INFO nova.db.sqlalchemy [-] Using mysql/eventlet db_pool.
2011-08-14 13:16:38,964 AUDIT nova.auth.manager [-] Created project matteo with manager matteo

$ bin/nova-manage project environment matteo matteo

2011-08-14 13:18:02,214 INFO nova.db.sqlalchemy [-] Using mysql/eventlet db_pool.

4- source novarc
5- launch euca-describe-images
$ euca2ools-1.3.1/bin/euca-describe-images 
2011-08-14 13:23:58,846 DEBUG nova.auth.manager [-] Looking up user: u'b05aa1c9-513b-473c-a6e0-0264641203cb' from (pid=28195) authenticate /home/matteo/openstack/nova/nova/auth/manager.py:277

2011-08-14 13:23:58,885 DEBUG nova.signer [-] using _calc_signature_2 from (pid=28195) _calc_signature_2 /home/matteo/openstack/nova/nova/auth/signer.py:126
2011-08-14 13:23:58,885 DEBUG nova.signer [-] query string: AWSAccessKeyId=b05aa1c9-513b-473c-a6e0-0264641203cb%3Amatteo&Action=DescribeImages&ExecutableBy.1=self&Owner.1=self&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2011-08-14T11%3A23%3A58&Version=2009-11-30 from (pid=28195) _calc_signature_2 /home/matteo/openstack/nova/nova/auth/signer.py:142
2011-08-14 13:23:58,885 DEBUG nova.signer [-] string_to_sign: GET
192.168.1.36:8773
/services/Cloud/
AWSAccessKeyId=b05aa1c9-513b-473c-a6e0-0264641203cb%3Amatteo&Action=DescribeImages&ExecutableBy.1=self&Owner.1=self&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2011-08-14T11%3A23%3A58&Version=2009-11-30 from (pid=28195) _calc_signature_2 /home/matteo/openstack/nova/nova/auth/signer.py:144
2011-08-14 13:23:58,885 DEBUG nova.signer [-] len(b64)=44 from (pid=28195) _calc_signature_2 /home/matteo/openstack/nova/nova/auth/signer.py:147
2011-08-14 13:23:58,886 DEBUG nova.signer [-] base64 encoded digest: INJvsfswyTG0wJmJrBSx83PJOT6XY7tqM/VJPWJmD9I= from (pid=28195) _calc_signature_2 /home/matteo/openstack/nova/nova/auth/signer.py:148

    return fmt.format(record)
